effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.
